    • Method Detail

      • applyOnEdge

        public void applyOnEdge​(Selector sel,
                        Object edge,
                        EdgeAttributesReader areader)
        Apply a selector on an edge using its attribute reader. If shouldStoreOldStyle is true it save the old style too.
        Parameters:
        sel - selector
        edge - a edge
        areader - a reader EdgeAttributesReader

      • applyOnNode

        public void applyOnNode​(Selector sel,
                        Object node,
                        NodeAttributesReader areader)
        Apply a selector on a node using its attribute reader. If shouldStoreOldStyle is true it save the old style too.
        Parameters:
        sel - a selector
        node - a object node
        areader - NodeAttributesReader reader

      • applyOnEdge

        public void applyOnEdge​(CSSEdgeStyle style,
                        Object edge,
                        EdgeAttributesReader areader)
        Apply a style on an edge using its attribute reader. If shouldStoreOldStyle is true it save the old style too.
        Parameters:
        style - css style
        edge - a object edge
        areader - EdgeAttributesReader reader

      • applyOnNode

        public void applyOnNode​(CSSNodeStyle style,
                        Object node,
                        NodeAttributesReader areader)
        Apply a style on an edge using its attribute reader. If shouldStoreOldStyle is true it save the old style too.
        Parameters:
        style - the style
        node - the node
        areader - a NodeAttributesReader reader

      • applySelectorsOnEdges

        public void applySelectorsOnEdges​(List selectors,
                                  Collection edges,
                                  EdgeAttributesReader ereader)
        Apply all the selectors in cascade on each edges If you want to apply only one selector, use applySelectorOnEdges instead.
        Parameters:
        selectors - an ordered list of selector to apply on each edges
        edges - a collection of edges to apply the selectors on
        ereader - an edge AttributesReader

      • applySelectorsOnNodes

        public void applySelectorsOnNodes​(List selectors,
                                  Collection nodes,
                                  NodeAttributesReader vreader)
        Apply all the selectors in cascade on each nodes If you want to apply only one selector, use applySelectorOnNodes instead.
        Parameters:
        selectors - an ordered list of selector to apply on each nodes
        nodes - a collection of nodes to apply the selectors on
        vreader - a node AttributesReader

      • applySelectorOnEdges

        public void applySelectorOnEdges​(Selector sel,
                                 Collection edges,
                                 EdgeAttributesReader ereader)
        Apply one selector on each edges from a collection If you want to apply several selector, use applySelectorsOnEdges instead.
        Parameters:
        sel - the selector to apply on each edges
        edges - a collection of edges to apply the selectors on
        ereader - an edge AttributesReader

      • applySelectorOnNodes

        public void applySelectorOnNodes​(Selector sel,
                                 Collection nodes,
                                 NodeAttributesReader vreader)
        Apply one selector on each nodes from a collection If you want to apply several selector, use applySelectorsOnNodes instead.
        Parameters:
        sel - the selector to apply on each nodes
        nodes - a collection of nodes to apply the selectors on
        vreader - an node AttributesReader

        Parameters:

        areader - a edge attributesReader (must be set to the right edge)
